item.title: 财政政策滞后，新兴市场货币任由央行摆布
item.description: 新兴市场的中央银行正在成为保护受到投机性攻击和财政短缺打击的本币的第一道防线。【原文：Emerging-market central banks are becoming the first line of defense to shield local currencies pummeled by speculative attacks and fiscal shortfalls.】

item.title: 迪拜房地产业举世瞩目的涨势显露疲态
item.description: 今年，随着开发商扎堆进入世界上最大的房地产繁荣期之一，迪拜将再次涌现出闪亮的新塔楼和别墅社区。然而，越来越多的迹象表明，创纪录的房价涨势正在放缓。【原文：Shiny new towers and villa communities will again spring up in Dubai this year as developers pile into one of the world’s biggest property booms. Yet there are growing signs that the record rally in prices is slowing.】

item.title: 苹果公司的 2025 计划：iPhone 大改、智能家居推进和人工智能赶超
item.description: 苹果公司计划在 2025 年大干一场，计划对 iPhone 产品线进行全面改造，推出新的人工智能功能，推动智能家居发展，并更新很久没有更新的产品。还有：公司最新的首席财务官上任；迈阿密和中国的新店即将开张；戴尔无耻地复制苹果的玩法，对 PC 进行重大品牌重塑。【原文：Apple plans a loaded 2025, with plans for an overhauled iPhone line, new AI features, a smart home push and updates to products it hasn’t refreshed in a while. Also: The company’s latest CFO takes the job; new stores in Miami and China are opening; and Dell shamelessly copies Apple’s playbook in major PC rebrand.】

item.title: S&P 的 18 万亿美元涨势受到 5% 收益率心理的威胁
item.description: 多年来，似乎没有什么能阻挡股市势不可挡的上涨步伐，因为从 2023 年初到 2024 年末，S&P 500 指数飙升了 50%以上，在此过程中，股市价值增加了 18 万亿美元。然而现在，华尔街看到了可能最终破坏这一涨势的因素：国债收益率超过 5%。【原文：For years it’s seemed like nothing could stop the stock market’s inexorable march higher, as the S&P 500 Index soared more than 50% from the start of 2023 to the end of 2024, adding $18 trillion in value in the process. Now, however, Wall Street is seeing what can ultimately derail this rally: Treasury yields above 5%.】

item.title: 伊朗通讯社报道：伊朗将利用军舰和隐形无人机扩充舰队
item.description: 据国营的伊斯兰共和国通讯社援引陆军协调副司令哈比卜拉-赛亚里（Habibollah Sayyari）少将的话报道，伊朗将在未来几天内接收一艘新战舰和一支先进的无人机舰队。【原文：Iran is set to receive a new warship and a fleet of advanced drones in the coming days, the state-run Islamic Republic News Agency reported, citing the Army’s coordinating deputy, Rear Admiral Habibollah Sayyari.】

item.title: 邮件称津巴布韦支持 ZiG 的储备金增至 5.33 亿美元
item.description: 据《星期日邮报》援引津巴布韦央行行长约翰-穆沙亚万胡（John Mushayavanhu）的话报道，受去年创纪录的黄金产量推动，截至 1 月 9 日，津巴布韦支持 ZiG 的储备已增至 5.33 亿美元。【原文：Zimbabwe’s reserves backing the ZiG rose to $533 million as of Jan. 9, boosted by last year’s record gold production, the Sunday Mail newspaper reported, citing central bank Governor John Mushayavanhu.】

item.title: 华尔街日报》称 Point72 计划向客户返还高达 50 亿美元的资金
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》报道，亿万富翁史蒂夫-科恩（Steve Cohen）的 Point72 资产管理公司在获得巨额利润后，将向投资者返还 30 亿至 50 亿美元。【原文：Billionaire Steve Cohen’s Point72 Asset Management will return between $3 billion and $5 billion to investors after posting large profits, according to a report in the Wall Street Journal.】

item.title: 益普索民调显示马克龙支持率降至六年新低
item.description: 根据益普索（Ipsos）为《每日论坛报》（La Tribune Dimanche）所做的民意调查，法国总统埃马纽埃尔-马克龙的支持率持续下降，并创下六年来的新低。【原文：French President Emmanuel Macron’s approval rating continues to decline and has hit a six-year low, according to a poll by Ipsos for La Tribune Dimanche newspaper.】

item.title: 作为外汇来源，冈比亚的汇款与旅游业不相上下
item.description: 据冈比亚中央银行行长称，去年冈比亚收到的海外工人汇款大幅增加，在经济外汇来源方面已可与旅游业相媲美。【原文：Gambia received a significant increase in remittances from overseas workers last year, rivalling tourism as a source of foreign exchange for the economy, according to the country’s central bank governor.】

item.title: 华尔街银行逆市反弹面临盈利考验
item.description: 在杰富瑞金融集团（Jefferies Financial Group Inc.【原文：Wall Street banks’ outlook for the year will be in the crosshairs after a disappointing first look at earnings from Jefferies Financial Group Inc. and a blowout jobs report that fanned inflation fears.】

item.title: 遇险油轮被拖至德国吕根岛附近的安全地带
item.description: 一艘悬挂巴拿马国旗的油轮上周在波罗的海失去动力，当局表示，这艘油轮已被拖到德国吕根岛附近的安全地带。【原文：An oil tanker sailing under the Panamanian flag that ran out of power in the Baltic Sea last week has been towed to safety off the German island of Ruegen, authorities said.】

item.title: DMart 母公司任命联合利华的 Asawa 于 2026 年接任首席执行官一职
item.description: Avenue Supermarts Ltd. 任命安舒尔-阿萨瓦（Anshul Asawa）为候任首席执行官，此前这家印度零售连锁店 DMart 运营商公布的利润未达预期，原因是电商公司在竞争中扩大了快速配送业务。【原文：Avenue Supermarts Ltd. named Anshul Asawa as its chief executive officer-designate after the Indian operator of retail chain DMart posted profit that missed estimates amid competition from e-commerce companies expanding their rapid deliveries business.】

item.title: 美国将新日铁结束美国钢铁竞标的最后期限延长至 6 月
item.description: 根据美国钢铁公司的声明，美国外国投资委员会批准延长新日本制铁公司放弃以 141 亿美元收购美国钢铁公司的最后期限。【原文：The Committee on Foreign Investment in the United States approved an extension of the deadline for Nippon Steel Corp. to abandon its $14.1 billion takeover of United States Steel Corp., according to a statement by US Steel.】

item.title: 2016年以来最差开局，中国股市笼罩在阴霾之中
item.description: 新年伊始，中国股市令人失望，地缘政治风险上升，暗示市场将面临更多麻烦。【原文：A familiar sense of pessimism is returning for equity investors in China, with rising geopolitical risks hinting at more trouble for the market after a disappointing start to the new year.】

item.title: 就业数据强劲，美国通胀将支持美联储暂停行动
item.description: 在就业市场强劲、经济稳健的背景下，美国的基本通胀率在 2024 年年底可能只会略有下降，这支持了美联储对进一步降息采取的 "缓慢 "态度。【原文：Underlying US inflation probably cooled only a touch at the close of 2024 against a backdrop of a resilient job market and steadfast economy, supporting the Federal Reserve’s go-slow approach to further rate cuts.】

item.title: 实物偿付债务的风险日益增加，引起监管机构的关注
item.description: 国际货币基金组织正计划深入研究允许公司推迟支付利息的实物支付债务日益盛行的问题，因为人们普遍担心这种工具可能会掩盖压力，从而破坏金融稳定。【原文：The International Monetary Fund is planning a deep dive on the growing prevalence of payment-in-kind debt that allows companies to defer interest payments, amid wider fears the tool could undermine financial stability by obscuring stress.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织发布对阿根廷 440 亿美元交易的严峻评估报告
item.description: 国际货币基金组织发表了一份对其最近在阿根廷失败的计划的沉痛回顾，完成了哈维尔-米莱总统在今年谈判新协议前所需的技术性步骤。【原文：The International Monetary Fund published a somber review of its most recent program that failed in Argentina, finishing a technical step needed before President Javier Milei negotiates a new agreement this year.】

item.title: Gensler 提醒切勿削弱零售交易商的防范措施
item.description: 即将卸任的美国证券交易委员会主席加里-根斯勒（Gary Gensler）对下届政府提出了警告：小心不要破坏保护中小型交易商的护栏。【原文：Outgoing SEC Chair Gary Gensler has a word of caution for the next administration: be careful about messing with the guardrails that protect mom-and-pop traders.】

item.title: 马里将在谈判后从矿工那里获得 12 亿美元付款
item.description: 在对采矿业进行全面改革后，马里将在今年第一季度从矿工那里获得 7500 亿非洲法郎（12 亿美元）的收入。【原文：Mali is set to get 750 billion CFA francs ($1.2 billion) from miners in the first quarter this year following an overhaul of its mining sector.】

item.title: 安桥公司为特朗普推动的钻井热潮准备管道建设
item.description: 如果即将上任的特朗普政府成功掀起钻井热潮，Enbridge 公司正在制定计划，以迅速提高其美国石油管道系统的输送能力。【原文：Enbridge Inc. is devising plans to rapidly boost capacity on its US oil pipeline system if the incoming Trump administration succeeds in kicking off a drilling boom.】

item.title: 武契奇表示，塞尔维亚准备收购俄罗斯在新独立国家炼油厂的股份
item.description: 塞尔维亚可以向俄罗斯天然气工业股份公司（Gazprom Neft PJSC）和俄罗斯天然气工业股份公司（Gazprom PJSC）付款，以退出这个巴尔干国家唯一的炼油厂，从而在美国对俄罗斯石油业实施新制裁后保持当地的燃料生产。【原文：Serbia can pay Gazprom Neft PJSC and Gazprom PJSC to exit the Balkan country’s only refiner in order to preserve local fuel production after it became ensnared in new US sanctions on Russia’s oil industry.】

item.title: 华尔街周刊负责任的银行业增长和通过人工智能提供负责任的零食
item.description:
美国银行首席执行官在其 15 年的任期内追求 "负责任的增长"。【原文：

Bank of America’s CEO has pursued “responsible growth” during his 15-year tenure.

】

item.title: 天气将加剧洛杉矶火灾的风险
item.description: 在短暂的喘息之后，天气将再次对洛杉矶不利，这让消防员们得以在美国人口第二大城市的大火中取得进展，并为官员们开始相互指责提供了足够的喘息机会。【原文：The weather will once again turn against Los Angeles after a brief respite that allowed firefighters to gain ground on blazes across the second-most populous US city and offered enough pause for officials to begin trading accusations.】

item.title: 美国股市在高收益季节面临现实考验
item.description: 随着各家公司开始发布季度财报，美国股市自互联网泡沫以来最强劲的两年涨势即将迎来下一次大考，这将是对估值是否已超越基本现实的一次重要检验。【原文：The US stock market’s strongest two-year rally since the dot-com bubble is heading into its next big test as companies start releasing quarterly earnings, providing a major gut check on whether valuations have outrun the underlying reality.】

item.title: 中国再次承诺结束猖獗的国内保护主义
item.description: 中国最高经济规划机构本周发布了一套打击保护主义的新指导方针。但这与美国或唐纳德-特朗普毫无关系。【原文：China’s top economic planning body this week released a new set of guidelines for battling protectionism. But it had nothing to do with the US or Donald Trump.】

item.title: 里夫斯力图平息市场动荡，英国吹捧中国交易
item.description: 英国财政大臣雷切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）在中国之行中试图消除市场对政府财政状况的担忧，她在中国达成的协议在未来五年内将为英国经济带来 6 亿英镑（约合 7.31 亿美元）的收益。【原文：UK Chancellor of the Exchequer Rachel Reeves sought to allay market concerns over the government’s fiscal position during a trip to China, where she reached deals worth £600 million ($731 million) to the British economy over the next five years.】

item.title: 意大利准备审查联合信贷银行在金色权力下的 BPM 收购案
item.description: 意大利正准备开始正式审查意大利联合信贷银行（UniCredit SpA）对 Banco BPM SpA 主动提出的收购要约，熟悉此事的人士称，这一程序是根据政府的 "金权 "规则进行的，如果交易获得批准，可能会施加一些条件。【原文：Italy is preparing to start a formal review of UniCredit SpA’s unsolicited offer for Banco BPM SpA, people familiar with the matter said, a process under the government’s “Golden Power” rules that may impose conditions should a deal be approved.】

item.title: 描绘全球经济：债券收益率飙升为 2025 年拉开序幕
item.description: 本周，全球债券市场出现抛售，原因是投资者担心通胀压力挥之不去，政府借贷负担沉重。【原文：Global bond markets sold off this week as investors worried about lingering inflationary pressures and heavy government borrowing.】

item.title: 货船在新加坡海域沉没，所有船员获救
item.description: 一艘越南货船在新加坡海上搜救区沉没，18 名船员全部获救。【原文：A Vietnamese cargo ship has sunk in the Singapore maritime search and rescue region and all 18 crew members have been rescued.】

item.title: 印尼和日本领导人同意加强国防和能源关系
item.description: 印度尼西亚和日本领导人在周六举行的一次会议上承诺在国防、能源和食品安全等多个领域深化双边合作，东京正努力提升其在东南亚的影响力。【原文：Indonesia and Japan’s leaders pledged to deepen bilateral cooperation on several fronts including defense, energy and food security at a meeting Saturday, as Tokyo seeks to boost its influence in Southeast Asia.】
